body: The one difference between using `Services.mm` and the message manager that UITour uses is that UITour's will only see events from webpages loaded in tab while `Services.mm` will see events from any webpage, so for example the sidebar, webextension panels etc. Since you're going to be doing domain checking I wouldn't expect that to be an issue though but if needs be you can do additional verification when sending a message up to the main process that the page is actually in a tab.
